desc.cn: Arduino CLI 是一个一体化的解决方案，它提供了 Boards/Library Manager、草图生成器、板检测、上传器以及许多其他工具，这些工具可以通过命令行或机器界面使用任何与 Arduino 兼容的板和平台
desc.en: Arduino CLI is an all-in-one solution that provides Boards/Library Managers, sketch builder, board detection, uploader, and many other tools needed to use any Arduino compatible board and platform from command line or machine interfaces
